other_tests.findings: CSF pleocytosis in 4 patients (31%), elevated CSF protein in 5 patients (38%)
Microorganisms isolated from sterile sites or tissue culture indicating significant infections
Various organisms including Candida albicans, CoNS, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa isolated from blood cultures
other_tests.changes_over_time: Severity of infections increased with multiple organisms isolated over time in some patients
